definition: a single spark (idiom); an insignificant cause can have a massive effect
a single spark can start a huge blaze (idiom); an insignificant cause can have a massive effect
pinyin: xing1 xing5 zhi1 huo3 , ke3 yi3 liao2 yuan2

definition: to wish for the stars and the moon/to have unreal expectations
pinyin: pan4 xing1 xing1 pan4 yue4 liang4

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，月光洗去了今晚天际中星星们昏暗的光。

sentences.english: It appears as a dusty, cloud-line across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 跨过夜空眼前是一条星星点点云雾线。

sentences.english: Don't complain beneath the stars about the lack of bight sopts in your life.
sentences.chinese: 不要在星星下抱怨生活中缺乏色彩。

sentences.english: it is said the black hole can engulf everything nearby such as stars.
sentences.chinese: 据说黑洞可以将周围的一切物体，如星星吞食掉。

sentences.english: I do not know. Perhaps the answer lies in the star that lit their path.
sentences.chinese: 我不得而知，只能留待引领智者的那星星自己回答。

sentences.english: The star indeed was not lit that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上那盏星星灯确实没有点亮。

sentences.english: Learn to locate these stars, and you'll always be able to find Capricornus.
sentences.chinese: 学会去找到这些星星们，找摩羯座就会很容易上手。

sentences.english: They wear white robes as well, and wear cone-shaped hats decorated with stars.
sentences.chinese: 他们也身着白袍，头戴装饰有星星的尖顶帽。

sentences.english: The stars blazoned on that wall.
sentences.chinese: 星星的纹章装点了那面墙。

sentences.english: For some stars both culminations take place above the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 有些星星两个中天都出现在地平之上。

sentences.english: Draw some trees and stars on the paper first.
sentences.chinese: 我们首先在纸头上画些树和星星。

sentences.english: Regulus is the brightest star in the constellation Leo.
sentences.chinese: 轩辕十四是狮子座中最亮的星星。

sentences.english: The stars shone brighter than ever before, and an owl hooted in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 星星照耀得比以往更加明亮，猫头鹰在远处咕咕叫着。

sentences.english: Kyla : Do you see the bright one right there?
sentences.chinese: 有没有看到那儿有颗最亮的星星？

sentences.english: Glittering stars make a subtle statement of prettiness on any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 闪闪发光的星星让你在任何场合都显得可爱。

sentences.english: It said "From the star keeper to The Gospel Church".
sentences.chinese: 信封上写着“发自星星灯守护人，写给福音教堂。”

definition: many stars/a vast sky full of stars
Xingzi county in Jiujiang 九江, Jiangxi
lit. whole sky, a multitude of stars
Sirius, a double star in constellation Canis Major 大犬座
